trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard.
This class cannot be inherited.

The WizardStepCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control uses the WizardStepCollection class for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property.

There are multiple ways you can access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects in the WizardStepCollection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Item%2A> property to directly access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object at a specific zero-based index.
- Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
- Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the WizardStepCollection collection into an <xref:System.Array> object.
Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to the end of the collection.
The Add method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to append to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to the collection at the specified index location.
The AddAt method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection at the specified index location.

To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> method.
The index location at which to insert <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to append to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects from the collection.
Use the Clear method to remove all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.

> [!NOTE] > After the Clear method removes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects from the collection, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Count%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection has a value of zero.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection contains a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object.
Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object is contained in the collection.

This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object before performing a task, such as removing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to find in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object is found in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
wizardStep is .

Copies all the items from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
Use the CopyTo method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array.
Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
After the items are in an array, you can use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects that receives the items copied from the collection.
The position in the target array at which the array starts receiving the copied items.

Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
Use the Count property to determine the number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine its upper bound.
The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.

Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implemented object that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the collection.

An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implemented object that contains all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
Determines the index value that represents the position of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object in the collection.

Use the IndexOf method to determine the index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object in the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to search for in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.

If found, the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in within the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection; otherwise, -1.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object into the collection at the specified index location.
The Insert method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection at the specified index location.
Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection.

To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> method.
> [!NOTE] > The Insert method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method perform essentially the same function.
When the Insert method is called, it simply passes the `wizardStep` and `index` parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
The index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the collection can be modified.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection can be modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread-safe).
This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface and is overridden to always return `false`.
For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object from the collection at the specified index.

Use the Item property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object at the specified index location in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection using array notation.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object to retrieve.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index location.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object from the collection.
Use the Remove method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.

Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from a specified location in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to remove from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object from the collection at the specified location.

Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection at the specified index location.

Alternatively, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A> method.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to remove.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> object itself.
For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
Copies all the items from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index in the target array.
A zero-based <xref:System.Array> that receives the items copied from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.
The <xref:System.Object> to append to the end of the collection.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
Determines whether the collection contains the specified object.
The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the collection.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Object> is found in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines the index value that represents the position of the specified object in the collection.
The object to search for in the collection.
The index value of the specified object in the collection.
Inserts the specified object in the collection at the specified position.
The index at which to insert the object into the collection.
The object to insert into the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the object at the specified index in the collection.
This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: myCollection[index].
The index of the object to get from the collection.
The object to be retrieved.
Removes the specified object from the collection.
The object to remove from the collection.
